flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Firs You Will Nedd a Baloon or a condom.Then you will need some acid and aluminium foil and a Led (any color will work im using a Rgb color changing)and a 3w Battery.Firs Put The Led With a Batery In a Baloon.2 Mix Acid And Aluminium foil in glass Botle (It Must BE glass Botle So it Wont Melt)And PUt Baloon Over it(be sure that your led Wont Drop in)Then tie a knot And LEt it Fly
guide.introduction_rendered: Firs You Will Nedd a Baloon or a condom.Then you will need some acid and aluminium foil and a Led (any color will work im using a Rgb color changing)and a 3w Battery.Firs Put The Led With a Batery In a Baloon.2 Mix Acid And Aluminium foil in glass Botle (It Must BE glass Botle So it Wont Melt)And PUt Baloon Over it(be sure that your led Wont Drop in)Then tie a knot And LEt it Fly
guide.summary: You Are Always Pranking Someone:But Why Wont You Prank The whole world.By Making The Led-Ufo
guide.title: Led-UFO
